- Implement changes according to the latest specification

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss you can revert this change.  No changes are needed in MainActivity.java.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss You can remove the unused import GateStatus on line 5.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss You can remove line 27 msg.setStatus(...) since you are already setting the status using the DoorStatus constructor.
timeline.author: santhanamk

@kostyaBoss I would delete line 36 and replace it with
assertEquals(TestValues.MATCH, TestValues.GENERAL_GRID, location);
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss It looks like you used the code generator tool to re-generate the entire file.  Can you just merge in the changes that are specific to this PR (in the HTML these would be the parameters from driverDoorAjar to roofStatuses)?
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss I think you can revert these changes, as vehicle data does not need to be changed for this PR.  The corresponding PR for the JavaScript suite (https://github.com/smartdevicelink/sdl_javascript_suite/pull/354/files) did not make changes to the vehicle data.

timeline.bodyText: The indentation for since & deprecated is not consistent in this file
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,78 +38,118 @@ import com.smartdevicelink.proxy.rpc.enums.IgnitionStatus; import java.util.Hashtable; +import java.util.List; /** - * The body information including power modes. - * - *

Note: The structure defines the information about the park brake and ignition.

* *

Parameter List

* * * * - * * - * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * + * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + * + * + * + *
Param NameTypeMandatoryDescriptionVersionRequiredNotesVersion Available
parkBrakeActiveBooleantrueDescribes, if the park break is active. The information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "PrkBrkActv_B_Actl".Y
ignitionStableStatusIgnitionStableStatustrueDescribes, if the ignition situation is considered stableThe information about stability of the ignition switch. See {@linkplain IgnitionStableStatus}SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "Ignition_Switch_Stable". See IgnitionStableStatus.Y
ignitionStatusIgnitionStatustrueThe information about ignition status. See {@linkplain IgnitionStatus}SmartDeviceLink 2.0
parkBrakeActiveBooleantrueThe information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "Ignition_status". See IgnitionStatus.Y
driverDoorAjarBooleantrueThe information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "DrStatDrv_B_Actl". Deprecated starting with RPC Spec 7.1.0.N + * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0 + * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 + *
passengerDoorAjarBooleantrueThe information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "DrStatPsngr_B_Actl". Deprecated starting with RPC Spec 7.1.0.N + * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0 + * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 + *
rearLeftDoorAjarBooleantrueThe information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "DrStatRl_B_Actl". Deprecated starting with RPC Spec 7.1.0.N + * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0

timeline.bodyText: It seems that the Javadoc for pre-existing fields has been updated in this PR. Can we revert that and only add/modify Javadoc for the fields that got modified/introduced in the proposal?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,78 +38,118 @@ import com.smartdevicelink.proxy.rpc.enums.IgnitionStatus; import java.util.Hashtable; +import java.util.List; /** - * The body information including power modes. - * - *

Note: The structure defines the information about the park brake and ignition.

* *

Parameter List

* * * * - * * - * + * + * + * * * * * - * - * - * + *
Param NameTypeMandatoryDescriptionVersionRequiredNotesVersion Available
parkBrakeActiveBooleantrueDescribes, if the park break is active. The information about the park brake: - true, if active - false if not.SmartDeviceLink 2.0References signal "PrkBrkActv_B_Actl".

timeline.bodyText: The unit tests on the PR currently fail because of an issue in develop branch. The issue got fixed on develop branch for Java Suite. Please merge develop into your branch and make sure that unit tests pass on the PR.
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -175,41 +247,177 @@ public IgnitionStatus getIgnitionStatus() {
         return (IgnitionStatus) getObject(IgnitionStatus.class, KEY_IGNITION_STATUS);
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Sets the driverDoorAjar.
+     *
+     * @param driverDoorAjar References signal "DrStatDrv_B_Actl". Deprecated starting with RPC Spec 7.1.0.
+     * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0
+     * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0
+     */
+    @Deprecated

timeline.bodyText: please replace this * SmartDeviceLink 2.0 with that: * * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0 * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 * For driverDoorAjar, passengerDoorAjar, rearLeftDoorAjar, rearRightDoorAjar to indicate that they are deprecated
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: @bilal-alsharifi I've made corresponding changes, please, re-review
replies.author: kboskin
